thread.title: Subway Florists in Full Bloom For Valentine’s Day
thread.title_full: Subway Florists in Full Bloom For Valentine’s Day - WSJ

author: Charles Passy
title: Subway Florists in Full Bloom For Valentine’s Day
text:
For most New Yorkers, the subway is a means to get from point A to point B—and an often gritty, unpleasant one at that.
But for Susan Holt, it is a place where love and beauty thrive, especially come Valentine’s Day.

Ms. Holt is the owner of the Posies Bouquet Bar, a flower seller situated in Turnstyle, a roughly 25,000-square-foot shopping complex in the 59th Street-Columbus Circle station. It is her mission to put a smile on...
